name: push
description: Adds one or more elements to the end of an array and returns the new length.

name: pop
description: Removes the last element from an array and returns it.

name: shift
description: Removes the first element from an array and returns it.

name: unshift
description: Adds one or more elements to the beginning of an array and returns the new length.

name: splice
description: Adds or removes elements from an array at a specific index.

name: slice
description: Returns a shallow copy of a portion of an array into a new array.

name: map
description: Creates a new array by applying a function to each element.

name: filter
description: Creates a new array with elements that pass a test function.

name: reduce
description: Applies a function against an accumulator and each element to reduce the array to a single value.

name: forEach
description: Executes a function for each element in the array.

name: find
description: Returns the first element that satisfies a test function.

name: findIndex
description: Returns the index of the first element that satisfies a test function.

name: includes
description: Checks if an array includes a certain value.

name: indexOf
description: Returns the first index at which a given element can be found.

name: lastIndexOf
description: Returns the last index at which a given element can be found.

name: sort
description: Sorts the elements of an array in place and returns the sorted array.

name: reverse
description: Reverses the order of the elements in an array in place.

name: concat
description: Merges two or more arrays and returns a new array.

name: join
description: Joins all elements of an array into a string.

name: flat
description: Creates a new array with all sub-array elements concatenated into it recursively up to a specified depth.

name: flatMap
description: Maps each element using a function and flattens the result into a new array.

name: every
description: Checks if all elements pass a test function.

name: some
description: Checks if at least one element passes a test function.

name: toString
description: Returns a string representing the array and its elements.

name: fill
description: Fills all elements in an array with a static value.

name: copyWithin
description: Copies part of an array to another location within the same array.
